name: Acorn Golf
description:
Goofy physics-based golfing game where you golf with an acorn. The acorn can root itself into the ground to move obstacles out of the way. This game was made solely by me in 36hrs for the 2023 Global GameJam where the theme was "Rooted"

Controls:

Click to start the shot, aim, and release to shoot the acorn.

Once aiming scroll the middle mouse wheel for height.

W- Zoom Out

A- Pan Cam Left

S- Zoom in

D- Pan Cam Right

Hope you enjoy!

(WARNING! VERY JANKY)
